description: This header file declares functions related to managing associated devices in a harvester component, including setting and getting harvesting status, reporting and polling periods, override TTL, and validation routines. It defines external functions for manipulating device-related timing and status parameters.
external_methods: BOOL isvalueinarray(ULONG val, ULONG *arr, int size)

methods.name: SetIDWHarvestingStatus
methods.description: Sets the harvesting status for associated devices, enabling or disabling harvesting.

methods.name: SetIDWReportingPeriod
methods.description: Sets the reporting period for associated devices scan in seconds.

methods.name: SetIDWPollingPeriod
methods.description: Sets the polling period for associated devices scan in seconds.

methods.name: GetIDWOverrideTTL
methods.description: Gets the timeout after which the IDW intervals revert to default.

methods.name: SetIDWOverrideTTL
methods.description: Sets the timeout for accelerated IDW polling intervals.

methods.name: GetIDWOverrideTTLDefault
methods.description: Gets the default timeout for override TTL.

methods.name: ValidateIDWPeriod
methods.description: Validates whether a given period is within acceptable range.

methods.name: isvalueinarray
methods.description: Checks if a value exists within an array of ULONGs.
